										<div class="heading-wrapper">
						<div class="heading-container">
							<h1 class="heading">HERE WITH ALL YOU NEED</h1>
																											</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</li>
			</ul>
	</div>

<div class="guttered text strip-component">
  <div class="strip-content">
    <div class="info">
              <h2 class="heading">Your Stay, Your Way</h2>
                    <div class=" copy"><p>We are focused on giving you the best stay possible to help you pursue your passions through travel.</p>
